pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw:
It's very difficult to select the color of a wall that is enclosed by other walls and has a floor above it. For example, the walls that are colored white in the image below (this is the second floor of a 3-story building):

![buildingeditorpickcolors.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3700286654-buildingeditorpickcolors.png)

I think this is because the top floor has a transparency of 0, but is still blocking the middle floor. Perhaps using `Visual::SetVisibility` would help? (Yes, our old friend from [#1331](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1331))
